tool_description: Dive into a world of knowledge with Trivia Genius API! Explore random trivia across diverse categories like sports, religion, politics, and more. Uncover answers and hints for an enriching trivia experience!
name: Trivia Genius API
title: Trivia Genius API

api_list.name: Random Trivia
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia-genius-api.p.rapidapi.com/random-trivia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia-genius-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia-genius-api.p.rapidapi.com/random-trivia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia-genius-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
